        Default constructor for the DBHelper.

                      int i1)

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        sqLiteDatabase - Current writable database
        i - Old version of DB. Set in GameDB
        i1 - New version of DB. Set in GameDB

        public long addGame(Game game)
        This function will add a game to the GameCollection table
        Parameters:
        game - the game object that is to be added
        Returns:
        -1 for failure, otherwise will return the row inserted at.

        Returns:

      • getGameByID

        public Game getGameByID(int passed_id)
        This function will get a game from the GameCollection table that has the passed id
        Parameters:
        passed_id - the id of the desired game
        Returns:
        A Game object of the requested game
